name: Avatar Design System (with variants)
description:
Avatar Design System (with Variants)


Create avatars for your designs, profile pics, or just for funsies.


Customize the following using Figma variants:


  • Eyes
  • Eyebrows
  • Hair
  • Mouths
  • Noses
  • Ears
  • Bonus “monster-theme” components like a Cyclops eye and Medusa hair


Made by Selina Her
